Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:

::Ramhorn and Stinkbomb sat in the mess hall of the Ark, chatting::


"So, Stinkbomb, you were escorting three deadly Predacons to a far off 
prison, and accidentaly passed through that mysterious anomally, then thye 
broke out and you crashed?"

"Yeah, Ramhorn, that's the most of it."

"Yeah, well, let me tell you, you should stay away from Liono.  He's nothing 
but an idiot.  Why the Elders sent him is beyond me." (Ramhorn took a sip of 
liquid energon)

"I'm just plain bored, how about we go out on patrol and see if we can slag 
any Preds?"

"That sounds like an interesting proposal.  I'm in." (Stinkbomb nodded, 
getting up, finishing off his energon and activating his com) <Hey, Liono, me 
and Ramhorn are going to go on patrol between grids Omega and Zinou>
(Deactivating the com, they both leave for the outside, transforming to beast 
mode)
